Summary: While walking through Clover Park in Santa Monica, I was looking up at the scattered dense rain clouds (but the sun was very bright and apparent), I noticed a blue/green streak of light fly across the sky into the rain-cloud..
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Santa Monica
There was one other sighting in Santa Monica on or around December 18th 2012
divs: sighting detailswhile walking through clover park in santa monica, i was looking up at the scattered dense rain clouds (but the sun was very bright and apparent), i noticed a blue\green streak of light fly across the sky into the rain-cloud. it moved much faster than a plane. like maybe 6x as fast. i could tell it was blue but i could not tell if it was the sun reflecting off the surface or if it was lit blue. it left a long streak as it flew into the dark rain-cloud. no noise was heard, just a 1-2 second visual. no one in the park appeared to notice it. i was on the phone with my girlfriend at the time and told her what i had just seen. i told my buddy from work what i had seen as well, then he told me that the previous night there was a meteor shower and it could have been remnants of the meteor shower. just stuck me as odd since the color was bright blue (metallic).
